title: Value Investing Foundations
description: Learn the core principles of value investing inspired by Benjamin Graham and Warren Buffett, including intrinsic value, margin of safety, and financial statement analysis.

title: Stock Market Investing for Beginners
description: An introductory course covering how stock markets work, basic investment strategies, risk management, and long-term portfolio building.

title: Fundamental Analysis of Stocks
description: Analyze companies using income statements, balance sheets, cash flow, and valuation ratios to identify high-quality stocks.

title: Technical Analysis & Trading Strategies
description: Master chart patterns, indicators, support and resistance, and practical trading setups used by professional traders.

title: Behavioral Finance & Investor Psychology
description: Understand how cognitive biases and emotional decision-making impact investors and financial markets.

title: Portfolio Management & Asset Allocation
description: Learn modern portfolio theory, diversification strategies, and risk-adjusted performance measurement.

title: Options Trading Strategies
description: Explore options basics, spreads, hedging techniques, and income-generating strategies using derivatives.

title: Algorithmic Trading Concepts
description: Introduction to systematic trading, backtesting strategies, and using data-driven models in financial markets.

title: Long-Term Investing & Wealth Building
description: Focus on long-term investing principles, index funds, compounding, and minimizing costs and taxes.

title: Risk Management for Traders
description: Learn position sizing, drawdown control, stop-loss strategies, and protecting capital in volatile markets.
